name: Andrés Ferraté
biography: Andres Ferrate is a developer advocate with Google’s Developer Relations team and the author of Google Wave: Up and Running (O’Reilly Media). In this role, he facilitates the implementation and utilization of the Google Wave platform to address a diverse set of user needs and use cases in various settings. Andres has worked with a variety of technologies throughout the past 13 years and his experience includes work in the private, public and non-profit sectors.
